paper_abstract: The paper is focused on 2D continuous models derived from a discrete micro-structure. A new continualization procedure that refers to the non-local interaction between variables of the discrete media is proposed. The proposed procedure covers mainly the application of two-point Pade approximations and allows us to obtain continuous models suitable for analysis of 2D lattice vibrations with arbitrary frequencies. (C) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Continuous models for 2D discrete media valid for higher-frequency domain
